headline: Base Co-Founder Draws Fire After Backing Soulja Boy’s Token Despite Repeated Scam Claims
summary: Base co-founder Jesse Pollak is facing mounting criticism after publicly engaging with and backing activity linked to a meme token associated with rapper Soulja Boy. The case revives long-running concerns about celebrity-driven crypto promotions and the responsibility of senior ecosystem figures.The controversy unfolded over a sequence of posts on X ...

headline: XRP News: Ripple’s RLUSD Eyes Wider Adoption as Stablecoin Expands to Coinbase’s L2 Base
summary: Ripple’s RLUSD stablecoin could see wider adoption, as the crypto firm just announced plans to expand it to four Ethereum layer-2 networks, including Coinbase’s Base. This announcement comes just days after the firm gained a conditional approval to become a U.S. trust bank, which gives RLUSD a dual layer of regulation. Ripple’s RLUSD To Expand

headline: Ripple Expands $1.3B RLUSD Stablecoin to Ethereum L2s via Wormhole in Multichain Push
summary: Ripple said it's testing its U.S. dollar stablecoin on Optimism, Base, Ink and Unichain with more blockchains to be added next year pending regulatory review.

raw.headline: Ripple Expands $1.3B RLUSD Stablecoin to Ethereum L2s via Wormhole in Multichain Push
raw.summary: Ripple said it's testing its U.S. dollar stablecoin on Optimism, Base, Ink and Unichain with more blockchains to be added next year pending regulatory review.

headline: Hex Trust’s High-Stakes Wrapped XRP Gambit: $100M Liquidity Infusion Fuels Bridge Exploit Fears
summary: Institutional custodian Hex Trust announced the launch of Wrapped XRP (wXRP) on Thursday, deploying the token across Ethereum, Solana, Optimism, and HyperEVM with $100 million in initial liquidity.The move aims to anchor Ripple’s RLUSD stablecoin pairs on EVM chains. XRP remained flat on the news, while RLUSD supply held steady ...
